Subject: Cost Allocation Project: UAE CM Vertical Shared Services Billing Data Requirement_ FY 2024

Dear Team,

I have previously reached out to some of you individually to gather billing data for selected months, based on that initial simulations we have run.

chunks.text:
As many of you are aware, we are currently working on the cost allocation project in collaboration with the Services vertical, which also covers CM vertical shared services. I have previously reached out to some of you individually to gather billing data for selected months, based on that initial simulations we have run.

 

As a recent update, the group is in the process of engaging external consultants to support this project. For this purpose, I request your support in providing the full-year 2024 billing data in the attached template, in a consistent and unified format under your respective service line. (Please follow the template to populate and share back the required data).

 

For reference, I have also attached an extract of the total revenue generated from the UAE CM support vertical. Kindly ensure that the billing data you populate in the template aligns with this extract so that we can identify and address any gaps.

 

We have already discussed this with other countries in a separate call and aligned on a submission deadline of Tuesday, end of day. Given that the volume of UAE data is comparatively higher, I kindly request you to share the completed template by Wednesday, end of day. This will allow sufficient time to validate and consolidate the data before sharing it with the project lead.

Your support and timely response on this are greatly appreciated.

 

Please feel free to reach out to me if any further clarification is needed.

 

Regards, 

 

Rabia

From: Rabia Anjum <Rabia.Anjum@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Thursday, 11 September 2025 12:41 PM
To: George Hammouch <Georges.Hamouche@chalhoub.com>; Pierre Dorlian <Pierre.Dorlian@chalhoub.com>; Muhammad Abu Rjeileh <Muhammad.Aburjeileh@chalhoub.com>; Furqan Akhai <Furqan.Akhai@chalhoub.com>; Maie Elzein <Maie.Elzein@chalhoub.com>; Suhaib Abu Khalid <Suhaib.Abukhaled@chalhoub.com>; Khaled Abdel Aziz <Khaled.M.Abdelaziz@chalhoub.com>; Khadije Diab <Khadije.Diab@chalhoub.com>; Mohammed Samer Suleiman <samer.suleiman@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Moutaz Alkholy <Moutaz.Alkholy@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: Cost Allocation Project: CM Vertical Shared Services Billing Data Requirement_ FY 2024
Importance: High

 

Dear Team, 

 

Thank you to everyone who attended today’s call.

 

As agreed during the call, please use the attached template to provide the unified and validated data from your respective countries and share it with us by Tuesday, end of day. Additionally, I have attached the extract from PBI showing the shared services revenue generated for FY 2024 under CM Support vertical from shared services GL.

As agreed during the call, please use the attached template to provide the unified and validated data from your respective countries and share it with us by Tuesday, end of day. Additionally, I have attached the extract from PBI showing the shared services revenue generated for FY 2024 under CM Support vertical from shared services GL.

 

For validation purposes, I kindly request you to cross-check the figures in the billing template against the PBI data before sharing it back.

 

For those who could not attend the meeting due to other commitments, please feel free to reach out to me anytime for clarification or support.

Your cooperation and timely response are highly appreciated.

 

Best regards,

 

Rabia

-----Original Appointment-----
From: Rabia Anjum <Rabia.Anjum@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rabia.Anjum@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, 10 September 2025 2:16 PM
To: George Hammouch; Pierre Dorlian; Moutaz Alkholy; Muhammad Abu Rjeileh; Furqan Akhai; Maie Elzein
Subject: Cost Allocation Project: CM Vertical Shared Services Billing Data Requirement_ FY 2024
When: Thursday, 11 September 2025 12:00 PM-12:30 PM (UTC+04:00) Abu Dhabi, Muscat.
Where: Microsoft Teams Meeting

 

Dear Team,

We are currently working on the Cost Allocation Model in collaboration with the Services team. The project is primarily being led by the Services vertical; however, as a number of shared services fall under the scope of the Country Management (CM) vertical, we are required to share the relevant billing data for the full FY 2024 with the project lead. To support this, it is essential that we gather structured and unified data from all countries, and for this reason, I am arranging this meeting.

As an initial step, we require this structured billing data from each country. Please note that as the project progresses, there may be additional queries or clarifications for which we will seek your continued support.

The objectives of the session will be to:

*	Provide context on the Cost Allocation Project and the role of CM vertical

chunks.text:
As an initial step, we require this structured billing data from each country. Please note that as the project progresses, there may be additional queries or clarifications for which we will seek your continued support.

The objectives of the session will be to:

*	Provide context on the Cost Allocation Project and the role of CM vertical

*	Walk through the required billing data structure and reporting template

*	Clarify any questions and address country-specific challenges

*	Align on timelines for data submission

Your participation is critical to ensure we provide complete and consistent inputs to the Services team and enable a smooth cost allocation process.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation and support.

Best regards,

 

 

________________________________________________________________________________

-----Original Appointment-----
From: Rabia Anjum <Rabia.Anjum@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rabia.Anjum@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, 10 September 2025 2:16 PM
To: George Hammouch; Pierre Dorlian; Moutaz Alkholy; Muhammad Abu Rjeileh; Furqan Akhai; Maie Elzein
Subject: Cost Allocation Project: CM Vertical Shared Services Billing Data Requirement_ FY 2024
When: Thursday, 11 September 2025 12:00 PM-12:30 PM (UTC+04:00) Abu Dhabi, Muscat.
Where: Microsoft Teams Meeting

 

Dear Team,

We are currently working on the Cost Allocation Model in collaboration with the Services team. The project is primarily being led by the Services vertical; however, as a number of shared services fall under the scope of the Country Management (CM) vertical, we are required to share the relevant billing data for the full FY 2024 with the project lead. To support this, it is essential that we gather structured and unified data from all countries, and for this reason, I am arranging this meeting.

As an initial step, we require this structured billing data from each country. Please note that as the project progresses, there may be additional queries or clarifications for which we will seek your continued support.

The objectives of the session will be to:

*	Provide context on the Cost Allocation Project and the role of CM vertical

As an initial step, we require this structured billing data from each country. Please note that as the project progresses, there may be additional queries or clarifications for which we will seek your continued support.

The objectives of the session will be to:

*	Provide context on the Cost Allocation Project and the role of CM vertical

*	Walk through the required billing data structure and reporting template

*	Clarify any questions and address country-specific challenges

*	Align on timelines for data submission

Your participation is critical to ensure we provide complete and consistent inputs to the Services team and enable a smooth cost allocation process.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation and support.

Best regards,
